titles.title: Spaceport Equality Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat spaceports like airports under the exempt facility bond rules.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
5/10/2007--Introduced.
Spaceport Equality Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the issuance of tax-exempt facility bonds for spaceports.
